alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:45AM EST until February 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...Between 16 feet and 18 feet, Minor flooding continues. Pasture and fields upstream, right and left bank from the Keiths Mill Road bridge, and downstream on the left bank begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
